title: How Far Can Matteo Jorgenson and Derek Gee Go After Historic Tour de France Top-10 Double?
content:
North Americans in the Tour de France: 3 Americans and 3 Canadians lit up the race from start to finish with attacks, top-10s, near-misses.

Read the full article at How Far Can Matteo Jorgenson and Derek Gee Go After Historic Tour de France Top-10 Double? on Velo.
author: ahood
